files.patch:
@@ -163,1 +163,2 @@
-    if ((UseAVX > 2) && (VM_Version::supports_avx512vl() || vlen == 64))
+    int vlen_in_bytes = vlen * type2aelembytes(bt);
+    if ((UseAVX > 2) && (VM_Version::supports_avx512vl() || vlen_in_bytes == 64))
@@ -172,1 +173,1 @@
-          ((UseAVX >= 2) || (vlen <= 8)))
+          ((UseAVX >= 2) || (vlen_in_bytes <= 8)))
